documentation.text:
@notice Nullify an amount of coins with an equal amount of debt
@param rad Amount of debt & coins to destroy
@notice This returns the stability fee treasury allowance for this contract by taking the minimum between the per block and the total allowances*

treasuryAllowance().notice: This returns the stability fee treasury allowance for this contract by taking the minimum between the per block and the total allowances*

approveSAFEModification(address).notice: Allow an address to modify your SAFE

canModifySAFE(address,address).notice: Checks whether msg.sender has the right to modify a SAFE*

confiscateSAFECollateralAndDebt(bytes32,.notice: Normally used by the LiquidationEngine in order to confiscate collateral and debt from a SAFE and give them to someone else

createUnbackedDebt(address,address,uint2.notice: Usually called by CoinSavingsAccount in order to create unbacked debt

denySAFEModification(address).notice: Deny an address the rights to modify your SAFE

disableContract().notice: Disable this contract (normally called by GlobalSettlement)

initializeCollateralType(bytes32).notice: Creates a brand new collateral type

modifyCollateralBalance(bytes32,address,.notice: Join/exit collateral into and and out of the system

modifySAFECollateralization(bytes32,addr.notice: Add/remove collateral or put back/generate more debt in a SAFE

settleDebt(uint256).notice: Nullify an amount of coins with an equal amount of debt

transferInternalCoins(address,address,ui.notice: Transfer internal coins (does not affect external balances from Coin.sol)

transferSAFECollateralAndDebt(bytes32,ad.notice: Transfer collateral and/or debt between SAFEs

updateAccumulatedRate(bytes32,address,in.notice: Usually called by TaxCollector in order to accrue interest on a specific collateral type

params.account: Account to give SAFE permissions to

params.collateralType: Collateral type the SAFE has locked inside
params.deltaCollateral: Amount of collateral taken/added into the SAFE (wad)
params.deltaDebt: Amount of debt taken/added into the SAFE (wad)

params.coinDestination: Usually CoinSavingsAccount that passes the new coins to depositors
params.debtDestination: Usually AccountingEngine that can settle uncovered debt with surplus

params.account: Account that is denied SAFE permissions

params.collateralType: Collateral type name (e.g ETH-A, TBTC-B)
Collateral type to join/exit
Collateral type we modify params for
params.parameter: The name of the parameter modified
The name of the parameter modified

params.collateralSource: Account we take collateral from/put collateral into
params.collateralType: Type of collateral to withdraw/deposit in and from the SAFE
params.debtDestination: Account from which we credit/debit coins and debt
params.deltaCollateral: Amount of collateral added/extract from the SAFE (wad)

params.rad: Amount of debt & coins to destroy

params.collateralType: Collateral type transferred
Collateral type transferred between SAFEs
params.deltaCollateral: Amount of collateral to take/add into src and give/take from dst (wad)
params.deltaDebt: Amount of debt to take/add into src and give/take from dst (wad)

params.collateralType: Collateral type we accrue interest for
params.rateMultiplier: Multiplier applied to the debtAmount in order to calculate the surplus [ray]
params.surplusDst: Destination for the newly created surplus

disableContract().notice: Disable this contract (normally called by GlobalSettlement)
